title: Prompts?
body: So um, I’m planning on writing some Drarry, can y'all give me ideas? I know what it’s gonna be like in general, but it’s still lacking a lil’ sumn and I was hoping y’all could help. Please?

reblog.comment: So um, I’m planning on writing some Drarry, can y'all give me ideas? I know what it’s gonna be like in general, but it’s still lacking a lil’ sumn and I was hoping y’all could help. Please?

blog.name: bewarethewolfarmy
blog.title: We Are The Pack
blog.description:
Merrick: "We once were many..."
Bigby: "We once were lost..."
Tsuki: "Now we are one...."
RJ: "Welcome to our Forest..."
Dillon: "Won't you stay for a while?"

(Multimuse blog for Wild Force, RPM, Jungle Fury, The Wolf Among Us and an OC, m!a allowed, multi-verse of course, crossovers highly welcome, read pages at your own pace)

blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: Memories All Too Sweet
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RUhwVn

by Tuftsie

The first Valentine’s Day after the horrific attack on the Potters rolls around, and Remus is stuck facing memories he wishes desperately to forget. But pain demands to be felt, and sometimes it’s the only way to heal.

Words: 6157, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Sirius Black, James Potter, Lily Evans Potter, Peter Pettigrew, Harry Potter (briefly)
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Hurt No Comfort, a tiny bit of fluff followed by a ton of angst, Valentine’s Day, Remus is not having a good Valentines, Nor is Sirius, Suicidal Thoughts, Sort Of, Memories, Grief/Mourning, Marauders, Canonical Character Death


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RUhwVn

blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: the weight of living
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2tgqVg0

by facingthenorthwind (spacegandalf)

“I’m here as the executor of Walburga Black’s will,” Bellwater said without preamble.

“Sorry?” Sirius said, blinking a few times. “I wasn’t aware I was even still in — hang on,” he said, turning to Remus for some reason. “You only get an executor of your will if you’re dead, right?”

Words: 2253, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 7 of everybody lives (except peter)

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Emotional Hurt/Comfort


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2tgqVg0

summary: JK should do a Regulus' spin-off

blog.name: fire1033
blog.title: What I see.
blog.description: Life through mine and your eyes.

body:
ADHD wizard

I was thinking about Harry Potter, and just imagine a kid with ADHD getting sorted. And them not knowing anything about it. I was only diagnosed as an adult in a country that is not stuck in the middle ages.

“John Doe” As Professor McGonagall called his name, John was excited, and rush up to the stool, taking in everything around him. As she started to place the sorting hat on his head, John couldn’t help the thousand thoughts rushing through his mind. Suddenly, he heard a voice.

“Gah! What in the world?! How can you function like this? I am getting a headache, and I don’t even have a head!”

John looked around for a sec. “Ummm, hi? Are you the hat?” “Of course I am! Could you calm down for a sec?” “What do you mean? I am fairly calm. Oh, look, that candle is about to drop. Wonder if it will hit the food. Hope they have pizza with dinner. Oh yeah, the sorting.” By this time the hat is just listening, trying to figure out what is going on. “You do realize this isn’t normal, right?” “What isn’t?” “Your thought patterns. Sure, some scattered thoughts are, but you are all over the place. What is going on?” “No idea.” John gave a single shrug. “I thought everyone thought this way. Can you hurry up? I am bored, and I need to rest to get rid of this headache.” “Well, I can see you are a great fit for Ravenclaw, but speak with a professor first thing in the morning.” “Ok. I will.” “I doubt you will remember. I will tell them.”

After the sorting and feast are complete, John goes to the tower with the rest of the first years and is shown the knocker. Before anyone can do anything, he knocks it to see the riddle.

“If nobody can smell something, does it smell?” The fifth year prefects are shocked. Why would a first is get such a hard question? As they prepare to intervene, John pipes up. “Depends. If smelling is the perception we have of those odor molecules, then no. If it is just the fact that the thing releases them, then yes.” As the door swings open, most are in shock, for what in the world did he mean?

In another part of the castle, the teachers are trying to figure out what to do. John obviously is smart, but why did the hat throw a fit? They are at a loss, as none of them know of the DSM.

 Curious about organized crime in the...
caption:
BE ORIGINAL. BE ANYONE. BE CREATIVE.

POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 14+ YEARS

Curious about organized crime in the magical world? Want to develop the quidditch scene? Eager to develop Hogwarts headcanons? If you’re looking for an active, welcoming community of skilled, creative writers who are committed to exploring and expanding Rowling’s fantastical world… JACFC may be the perfect home for you!

summary: Happiness can be found in the darkest of places, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
text: Happiness can be found in the darkest of places, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
source: Professor Albus Dumbledore, Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (film)

summary: There’s no need to call me sir, professor.
text: There’s no need to call me sir, professor.
source: Harry Potter to Professor Severus Snape, Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince

summary:
Draco: You look happy today
Scorpius: Albus said yes to be my boyfriend
Draco: A Potter! Show me your magic, kid

blog.name: remusandtonks
blog.title: Remus and Tonks
blog.description:
"Tonks deserves somebody young and whole."

"But she wants you."

Me: *dies*

summary:
Remus: Teddy said a bad word today
Tonks: where the fuck did he learn that?
